name: fancily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a decorative or complicated way: She had dressed very fancily for what was meant to be a trip to the shops. They brought in a fancily decorated birthday cake.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's an impressive apartment, but a little too fancily furnished for my liking.The chapel is known for its fancily carved pillars.The Belgian chocolates were sold in fancily wrapped, colourful boxes.It's one of those restaurants where small but delicious mouthfuls of food are fancily presented on enormous plates.
